div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 739 Didymotichon, Thrace, c. 1870-1875 (327) Burial: c. 330-320 B.C. (T) Contents: 1000+ AR Abdera: dr. (some) Apollonia Pontica: tetrob. (c. 10) Maroneia: tetrob. (some) Thracian Chersonese: hemidr. (three-fourths of find) Parium: hemidr. (many) Disposition: unknown Tacchella, RN 1898, pp. 214-5 Le Rider, Deux tr√©sors, p. 52, note 4 Tacchella includes as part of the same bd. the 20 late tetradr. of no. 960 below but it seems almost certain that two separate finds are involved
